thread.title: Arsenal Fans Are Losing The Plot Over Latest Arsene Wenger News
thread.title_full: Arsenal Fans Are Losing The Plot Over Latest Arsene Wenger News

title: Arsenal Fans Are Losing The Plot Over Latest Arsene Wenger News
text:
Arsenal Fans Are Losing The Plot Over Latest Arsene Wenger News Sat Feb 04 2017 21:19:41   21:19:41 GMT+0000 (GMT) Josh Lawless Josh Lawless in football 
Fans of Arsenal fans are not pleased at all by the news that Arsene Wenger has been offered a two-year contract extension by the club. 
Wenger's contract offer was reported by The Independent this morning, though it was no surprise that it wasn't until after today's game where the reactions started coming in from Arsenal fans following the dismal defeat away at Chelsea; the Gunners' second defeat in the same week. 
Wenger says he will not be rushed into making a decision about his future but after another torrid spell and the Premier League title surely out of reach, there's no doubt that fans of the North London club will be hoping he doesn't put pen to paper on the contract. 
Many supporters made their thoughts known on social media: Arsene Wenger should do the honourable thing and fuck off at seasons end despite a new contract on the table. This is just soul destroying. - Alex Zaia (@zaiaalex) February 4, 2017 Arsenal fans on hearing arsene wenger has sighed a new 8m a year 2yr contract next month #afc pic.twitter.com/pEPwaNGN9S
